item.title: Report X-2025050311
item.description:
Report X-2025050311

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-04
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Forklift driver punctured 1 tote when moving freight. Maree Montoya, 120/ABQ Operations Supervisor, reported 330 Gallons from 1 tote spilled on dock floor due to a forklift operator puncturing the tote. A crew from Environmental Restoration arrived. Crews placed absorbent pads and absorbent booms t o contain the release on the loading dock. Environmental Restoration personnel utilized a shop-vac to collect freestanding liquid throughout the release site. Environmental Restoration personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted area and worked them in with hand tools. Crews utilized a s hop-vac to transfer the remaining contents of the damaged tote into 55-gallon drums. All alcoholic beverage-impacted material was collected and containerized in five (5) 55-gallon drums and staged on-site for further management. ER personnel noted no further actions required on-site and crews demobi lized.
